thread.title: Sony launches Xperia Z5 in India, priced at Rs 62,990
thread.title_full: Sony launches Xperia Z5 in India, priced at Rs 62,990 | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Sony launches Xperia Z5 in India, priced at Rs 62,990
text:
Other Articles Meru Cabs joins Taxis G7 alliance; eyes foreign tourists Mahindra Gusto Special Edition Launched With New Dual-Tone Colours; Priced at Rs. 49,350 JSW Steel July-September profit slides 84% Sony has launched its new Xperia Z5 range of smartphones in India today. The flagship Z5 smartphone is priced at Rs 52,990 while the Z5 Premium with 4K display will be available at Rs 62,990. The Xperia Z5 will be available from October 23 and Z5 Premium will hit the store shelves from November 7.
The USP of the Xperia Z5 Premium is that it is the world’s first 4K-screen smartphone. Sony had first launched these phones at the annual IFA 2015 fair in Berlin.
Specs of Sony Xperia Z5 are 5.2-inch full HD screen, Android Lollipop 5.1, 64-bit octa-core Snapdragon 810 (MSM8994); Adreno 430 GPU, 3GB RAM, 32GB storage (expandable to 200 GB). The camera in the Z5 series is the 23 mp in the rear and 5 mp camera on the front. The battery for the Z5 is 2900 mAh.
According to Sony, the Xperia Z5’s camera has the fastest autofocus in a smartphone with a speed of just 0.03 seconds, which the company claims is faster than the blink of a human eye.
The Z5 Premium has the similar specs as the Z5 other than the 4K screen. It also has a bigger battery 3430 mAh.
The Xperia Z5 will be available in Gold, Green and Black colour options, while the Premium will come in Gold and Chrome.
Customers who will buy the new Sony smartphones will also get content worth over Rs. 4000 along with their devices, which includes 3 months subscription to Sony Music and unlimited download to own content worth Rs 1500. Xperia Z5 customers will also get f ree 3 months subscription to Sony LIV worth Rs 299, Amazon Kindle e-books worth Rs 1000, 3 months subscription to Hungama Play worth Rs 750.
 21, 2015 4:48 pm © The Indian Express Online Media Pvt Ltd
